overview: Includes two episodes of the hit television series "Care Bears."  "The Care Bears Carneys"- Episode 39- Beastly and Shreeky trick the Care Bears away from their work and into a carnival they set up as a trap to capture them.  "The Secret of The Box"- Episodes 51-  Trouble abounds when the crew of the S.S. Friendship become obsessed with opening a box to be delivered to an alien planet.
tagline: There's a Care Bear for every feeling!
title: Care Bears
